commit.message:
re PR c++/51413 (Broken diagnostic with __builtin_offsetof)

/cp
2013-06-14  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/51413
	* semantics.c (finish_offsetof): Handle INDIRECT_REF as expr.

/testsuite
2013-06-14  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/51413
	* g++.dg/ext/builtin-offsetof1.C: New.

From-SVN: r200110

files.patch:
